mechanics.mid_field: Must be controlled ONLY to allow FC passage.
mechanics.policy: Flag > Kills. If not killing EFC or peeling for FC, you are useless.

Flags.Focused_Assault: Debuff applied to carriers after 10-15 minutes. Increases damage taken by 10% per stack. Spell ID: 46392.

Buffs.Speed: Boots spawn in tunnel/side rooms. +100% Movement Speed for 10s.

combat.rule: Ignore random 1v1s. Fight where the FLAG is.
combat.mid_control: Control the middle to intercept THEIR flag carrier or escort YOURS. Do not fight just to fight.
combat.tunnel_vision: If EFC is crossing, DROP TARGET and kill EFC.

movement.fc_pathing: Tunnel or Ramp. Never mid unless escorted.
movement.support_pathing: Move to the FC. Do not sit in mid if FC is in tunnel.

situational_logic.stalemate_forcing: If Enemy has our Flag, and you are closer to THEIR flag than the EFC, TAKE THEIR FLAG. This prevents them from capping.

Friendly_Flag.action: Protect at all costs. Peel, Heal, CC.

Midfield_Control.action: Dominate mid to open lanes for FC.

Standard.name: Mid-Map Control for Transport
Standard.tactics: Hold mid to control rune spawns and intercept EFC. Once our FC has flag, collapse to escort.

EFC_Hunting.name: Zerg the Carrier
EFC_Hunting.tactics: Ignore all DPS/Healers. Focus fire the Flag Carrier. CC the healers.

Counter_Cap.name: The Stalemate Forcer
Counter_Cap.condition: Enemy has our flag AND Team does not have enemy flag AND Bot is inside Enemy Base (Distance check < 100y)
Counter_Cap.action: IGNORE EFC. Grab the Enemy Flag IMMEDIATELY.
Counter_Cap.reason: Taking their flag prevents them from capping ours. It forces a stalemate and buys time for the team to hunt the EFC.
